subject: Heisman Trophy
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: It is often forgotten that John Heisman was an innovative coach who acted as football's conscience. He was a forceful defender of its soul and a tireless advocate of its potential.
snippet: It is often forgotten that John Heisman was an innovative coach who acted as football's conscience. He was a forceful defender of its soul and a tireless advocate of its potential.
